comments:
I started orion from within eclipse, it ran fine.. I started the builtin 
webbrowser in eclipse (ie) and that worked, but when I tried to close an open 
file (was already saved before launching) eclipse exited. Log:

This stack trace looks like it occured when you started Orion (note the 
OrionManager.start method on the stack). If the crash occurred after Orion was 
already running, this stack trace doesn't appear to be the cause of the crash.

If the problem occurred when you closed an editor, it doesn't sound like a 
debugger problem - to my knowledge, we don't have any code that runs when an 
editor is closed.

Since I don't think this stack trace was the cause of the crash, move to close.

Closing a file, and the given stack trace are not related. As well, the code 
shown in the stack trace (debug code), no longer exists in M6. Closing.

The problem happened again, I'm running F1 now, but the problem swt related. I 
found a log file for the problem, also for the first time it occured. here they 
come:
